description: Instructs the specified agents to stop collecting data.

nested_items.name: agentsConfigurationStatus
nested_items.description: Information about the agents that were instructed to stop collecting data. Information includes the agent ID, a description of the operation performed, and whether the agent configuration was updated.

nested_items.name: operationSucceeded
nested_items.description: Information about the status of the StartDataCollection and StopDataCollection operations. The system has recorded the data collection operation. The agent receives this command the next time it polls for a new command.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the operation performed.
